'''Smooth basalt''' is an ornamental rock [[smelt]]ed from [[basalt]] or found as part of [[amethyst geode]]s and [[ancient cities]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Smooth basalt drops as an item if mined by any [[pickaxe]]. If mined by any other tool, it drops nothing.

{{Breaking row|Smooth Basalt|Pickaxe|Wooden|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Smooth basalt generates naturally as a part of the outer layer of [[amethyst geode]]s.

Smooth basalt also generates in [[ancient cities]].

{{block distribution}}

=== Smelting ===
{{Smelting
|head=1
|Basalt
|Smooth Basalt
|0.1
|foot=1
}}

== Usage ==
Smooth basalt is a decorative block, and is not currently used for any [[crafting]] or [[smelting]] recipes.
